page.title: 10RECREATION IN GILLING WEST
page.content: Gilling is a small village but there are recreational activities to suit all age groups of residents. For the young children there is a{playgroup on Monday and Friday mornings in the village hall. For children over 10 there is a {Youth Club} on Tuesday nights. There is a {Karate Club} on Monday and Wednesday nights for the over sixteens. {St. Agatha's Church Guild}is held in the village hall, church or vicarage. There is also a branch of the{Women's {Institute. } In the White Swan pub, ladies play {darts}on Tuesdays & Wednesdays. In the other pub,the Angel,{bingo}is played on Wednesday, as well as darts. The village hall is used for {badminton} and {dominoes,}as well as various other{fund raising events.
